text:
Hello everyone

I have images that display fine when editing the page, but once online, the src link of the image no longer works.

The problem appears on several pages. The images were displaying very well and from one day to the next they are no longer displayed.

You can see the problem on this page: <https://www.asys.fr/gestion-temps-activites/logiciel-gestion-temps-de-travail> In the section: “Découvrez nos solutions complémentaires à la gestion des temps de travail”.

Has anyone had this problem before?
If i visit the page I can actually see the image, maybe it's a cache issue

Our Design Manager has gotten pretty crazy and unorganized over the last 7-8 years. Does anyone know of a tool or app that helps clean up and organize HubSpot Design Manager?

Any suggestions are greatly appreciated!
Out of curiosity, what would you expect a tool like this to do?
